attributes.action: Restrict MP's pay rises to no more than the average public sector pay rise.
attributes.background:
MP's are being awarded yet another inflation busting pay rise, whilst other public sector workers are still being awarded much less. 

MP's should not be awarded more than the average increase awarded to all other public sector workers (police/nurses/fire/amb/civil service etc).

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
